misuse: CWE-330: Use of Insufficiently Random Values
vulnerable_code:
SecureRandom rand1 = new SecureRandom(seedBytes);
SecureRandom rand2 = new SecureRandom(seedBytes);
description: The same seed is used to initialize two SecureRandom instances, which can lead to predictable and non-uniform random number generation.
recommendation: Use a cryptographically strong random seed to initialize the SecureRandom instances, and ensure that different seeds are used for different instances to improve randomness and unpredictability of the generated numbers.
